mapper.select: SELECT document_title, document_contents, document_date, document_state FROM document d WHERE d.document_no = #{value}

SELECT approval_no, approval_date,approval_state, e.employee_no,employee_name,position,department_name FROM approval a left join employee e on a.EMPLOYEE_NO=e.EMPLOYEE_NO left join department m on e.DEPARTMENT_NO = m.DEPARTMENT_NO WHERE a.document_no = #{value} ORDER BY approval_no
